Perusahaan: PT Surya Karto Abadi (Tutor Time Preschool)
Deskripsi:
A reputable Preschool and Kindergarten School has immediate vacancy for GADING SERPONG center:
PRESCHOOL / KINDERGARTEN TEACHER
Fluent in English (oral and written)
Min 3 years relevant teaching experience with degree in early childhood education or related fields
Creative and passionate in working with young children
Good team player and can communicate well with parents
Job responsibilities:
Plan and prepare lesson materials and instructional methods
Implement Tutor Time curriculum and teaching practice
Create positive and appropriate classroom environment
Develop and implement effective classroom management system
Observe, evaluate and record children's progress in all area
Provide constructive feedback to parents and School Administration
Maintain all equipments to be clean and in good repair
Perform required administrative duties
Participate in required trainings provided by School
Participate in school's marketing activities and other school events
Uphold Tutor Time's values, policies, rules and procedures
Wanita usia 23-30 tahun. Pendidikan S1 jurusan olahraga/PJOK, Berpengalaman, Tidak merokok, Bisa berkomunikasi sederhana dalam bahasa Inggris, Dapat mengoperasikan komputer & MS Office

Menguasai Word, Excel, Mampu dan mengerti Membuat RPPM dan RPPH, Mampu membuat Kegiatan dan event sekolah, Mengerti Sistem Sentra, Mengerti Doa doa harian dalam islam, Mampu berkerja dalam Tim, Kreatif
Menguasai sensory play, usia 21-35 tahun, aktif dan komunikatif, dapat berkomunikasi dengan baik, menyukai anak-anak

Menguasai early childhood education, Wanita, 22 – 35 tahun, Dapat menghandle anak dengan baik, kreatif, aktif dan komunikatif, dapat bekerjasama dalam tim, Pendidikan minimal Diploma, Memiliki pengalaman mengajar
